Description:
Title:KBR Abu Dhabi is currently looking to fill a position of Senior Designer  for a PMC project to be based in Abu Dhabi Client’s Office.Profile matching below criteria only will be contacted.RequirementsMinimum Overall 10+ years of experience in oil and Gas industry.
Experience as a Senior Designer for ( Process/ Mechanical/ Electrical) minimum 5+ years
Having previous experience working in offshore projects would be an added advantage.
Minimum 5 years’ experience in GCC/ Offshore projects
Diploma in Engineering is a MUSTExperienceExpertise with 3D Modeling tools and shall have at least 5 years’ hands on experience with computer aided design (CAD Software).
Candidate shall have experience of Execution of SMARTPLANT & AVEVA Tools for As building project.
Candidate must have experience in AUTOCAD & Offshore Site.
Willingness to travel and visit Offshore SITE frequently.Job Details
